name: 何恭睿
objective:
本課程包括：海洋、海岸的地質作用、地震、地球的內部、地殼 變動、大陸和山脈、能源和能源礦產、地球的資源、板塊構造學說 、地球和太陽系等。
Geology is a study of the planet Earth. It is concerned with the origin of the planet, the material and morphology of the Earth, and its history and present forms. Geology (2) include : coastal scenery and the work of the sea, marine sediments and the ocean floor, earthquakes, plate tectonic, mineral resources, etc.
schedule:
01  教學大綱與上學期復習
02  岩石如何變形 How Rock Bends,Buckles and Breaks
03  岩石如何變形 How Rock Bends,Buckles and Breaks
04  地震與地球內部 Earthquakes and Earth’s Interior
05  地震與地球內部 Earthquakes and Earth’s Interior
06  地質年代與岩石記錄 Geologic Time and the Rock Record
07  地質年代與岩石記錄 Geologic Time and the Rock Record
08  複習 Review
09  期中考試並決定預警名單
10  大地變化的面貌 The Changing Face of the Land
11  塊體損耗 Mass Wasting
12  河流與流域系統 Streams and Drainage System
13  地下水 Groundwater
14  冰河與冰河作用 Glaciers and Glaciation
15  大氣、風與沙漠 Atmosphere, Winds and Deserts
16  大洋及其邊界 The Oceans and Their Margins
17  總複習 Review and Overview
18  期末考試並決定學期成績
